name: Broward Health
notes: North Broward Hospital District; 4 hospitals (Medical Center, North, Imperial Point, Coral Springs). Tax-supported public hospital district governed by board appointed by the Governor.

name: West Tennessee Healthcare
notes: Jackson-Madison County General Hospital District; 8 hospitals across West Tennessee. Created by 1949 private act of TN legislature. Self-sustaining public hospital district.

name: Memorial Healthcare System
notes: South Broward Hospital District; 6 hospitals including Memorial Regional, Memorial West, Memorial Miramar, and Memorial Pembroke. Statutory special tax district.
